data.name: ArcScaleMarkerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: ArcScaleMarkerShapeScale
data.value: Gets or sets the marker's scale along the X and Y axes.

data.name: ArcScaleMarkerShapeOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the marker's center from the scale arc.

data.name: ArcScaleMarkerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: ArcScaleMarkerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleMarker object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleMarkerArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleMarker object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleMajorTickmark
data.value: Provides access to major tick marks' display options.

data.name: ArcScaleMajorTickCount
data.value: Gets or sets the total number of major tickmarks displayed on a circular scale.

data.name: ArcScaleLogarithmicBase
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying a logarithmic base when the ArcScale.Logarithmic property is enabled.

data.name: ArcScaleLogarithmic
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the axis should display its numerical values using a logarithmic scale.

data.name: ArcScaleLabels
data.value: Provides access to the collection of text labels displayed on the same layer as the current scale.

data.name: ArcScaleIsLogarithmic
data.value: This property is reserved for future use.

data.name: ArcScaleIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the current object is identical to the some predefined empty ArcScale object.

data.name: ArcScaleIsDiscrete
data.value: This property is reserved for future use.

data.name: ArcScaleIsAnimating
data.value: Gets a value indicating that the arc scale is currently being animated.

data.name: ArcScaleEndAngle
data.value: Gets or sets the angle at which the scale ends.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the layer.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerScaleCenterPos
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the scale's center relative to the layer's left-top corner.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleEffectLayer object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleEffectLayerArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleEffectLayer object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleCustomLogarithmicBase
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying a logarithmic base when the ArcScale.Logarithmic property is set to true and ArcScale.LogarithmicBase is set to LogarithmicBase.Custom.

data.name: ArcScaleCenter
data.value: Gets or sets the center of the scale arc.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the layer.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerScaleCenterPos
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the scale's center relative to the layer's left-top corner.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleBackgroundLayer object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleBackgroundLayerArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleBackgroundLayer object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleAutoRescaling
data.value: Gets or sets whether the scale's range of values is automatically expanded when the scale's current Value reaches either the ArcScale.MinValue or ArcScale.MaxValue.

data.name: ArcScaleAppearance
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings of the scale.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleEndOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the needle's end point from the scale arc.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleNeedle object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleMinValue
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum value of the circular scale.

data.name: ArcScaleMinorTickmark
data.value: Provides access to minor tick marks' display options.

data.name: ArcScaleMinorTickCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks on the scale between adjacent major tickmarks.

data.name: ArcScaleMaxValue
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum value of the circular scale.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleNeedle object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleStartOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the needle's starting point from the scale center.

data.name: ArcScaleNeedleVector
data.value: Identifies the current direction of a vector pointing to the current value.

data.name: ArcScalePercent
data.value: Gets the percent of the current value, in relation to the scale's minimum and maximum values.

data.name: ArcScaleRadiusX
data.value: Gets or sets the X radius of the scale arc.

data.name: ArcScaleRadiusY
data.value: Gets or sets the Y radius of the scale arc.

data.name: ArcScaleRangeBarArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleRangeBar object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleRangeBarRoundedCaps
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies whether to show the rounded caps in the arc scale range bar.

data.name: ArcScaleRanges
data.value: Provides access to the collection of custom ranges with which you can mark specific value ranges along the scale.

data.name: ArcScaleRescalingBestValues
data.value: Enables an algorithm for smart adjustment of the ArcScale.MinValue and ArcScale.MaxValue properties when the ArcScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: ArcScaleRescalingThresholdMax
data.value: Specifies the threshold, in percents, where the automatic correction of the ArcScale.MaxValue takes place. This property is in effect if the ArcScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: ArcScaleRescalingThresholdMin
data.value: Specifies the threshold, in percents, where the automatic correction of the ArcScale.MinValue takes place. This property is in effect if the ArcScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: ArcScaleSpindleCapArcScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleSpindleCap object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleSpindleCapScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current ArcScaleSpindleCap object is linked.

data.name: ArcScaleSpindleCapShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: ArcScaleSpindleCapShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: ArcScaleSpindleCapSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the layer.

data.name: ArcScaleStartAngle
data.value: Gets or sets the angle at which the scale starts.

data.name: ArcScaleValue
data.value: Gets or sets the scale's current value.

data.name: BaseGaugeBounds
data.value: Gets or sets the gauge's bounds.

data.name: BaseGaugeProportionalStretch
data.value: Gets or sets whether the gauge is proportionally zoomed when resizing.

data.name: BaseLeafPrimitiveEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the object is enabled.

data.name: BaseLeafPrimitiveShader
data.value: Gets or sets an object that allows the color of the object to be modified.

data.name: BaseLeafPrimitiveZOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the Z-Order of the object.

data.name: BaseRangeBarAnchorValue
data.value: Gets or sets the start value of the range.

data.name: BaseRangeBarAppearance
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings of the range bar.

data.name: BaseRangeBarEndOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the range bar's most distant arc from the scale arc (in case of an arc scale) or the offset of the range bar's right edge from the scale axis (in case of a linear scale).

data.name: BaseRangeBarScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current BaseRangeBar object is linked.

data.name: BaseRangeBarStartOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the range bar's nearest arc from the scale center (in case of an arc scale) or the offset of the range bar's left edge from the scale axis (in case of a linear scale).

data.name: BaseRangeBarValue
data.value: Gets or sets the value of a range bar.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerBottomRight
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the layer's right-bottom corner.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerShapeCenter
data.value: Gets the shape used to paint the layer's center.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerShapeFar
data.value: Gets the shape used to paint the layer's most distant edge.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerShapeNear
data.value: Gets the shape used to paint the layer's nearest edge.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: DigitalBackgroundLayerTopLeft
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the layer's left-top corner.

data.name: DigitalEffectLayerBottomRight
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the layer's right-bottom corner.

data.name: DigitalEffectLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: DigitalEffectLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: DigitalEffectLayerTopLeft
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the layer's left-top corner.

data.name: LabelAllowHTMLString
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML tags can be used to format the Label.Text.

data.name: LabelAppearanceBackground
data.value: Contains appearance settings used to paint the label's background.

data.name: LabelAppearanceText
data.value: Contains appearance settings used to paint the label's text.

data.name: LabelFormatString
data.value: Gets or sets the format string for the display text.

data.name: LabelPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the label's center within the parent gauge.

data.name: LabelSize
data.value: Gets or sets the label's size.

data.name: LabelText
data.value: Gets or sets the label's text.

data.name: LabelTextOrientation
data.value: Gets or sets the orientation of the label's text.

data.name: LinearScaleAppearance
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings of the scale.

data.name: LinearScaleAutoRescaling
data.value: Gets or sets whether the scale's range of values is automatically expanded when the scale's current Value reaches either the LinearScale.MinValue or LinearScale.MaxValue.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerLinearScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleBackgroundLayer object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleBackgroundLayer object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerScaleEndPos
data.value: Positions the current layer relative to the scale's ending point.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerScaleStartPos
data.value: Positions the current layer relative to the scale's starting point.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: LinearScaleBackgroundLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerLinearScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleEffectLayer object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleEffectLayer object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerScaleEndPos
data.value: Positions the current layer relative to the scale's ending point.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerScaleStartPos
data.value: Positions the current layer relative to the scale's starting point.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: LinearScaleEffectLayerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: LinearScaleEndPoint
data.value: Gets or sets the ending point of the scale.

data.name: LinearScaleIsAnimating
data.value: Gets a value indicating that the linear scale is currently being animated.

data.name: LinearScaleIsDiscrete
data.value: This property is reserved for future use.

data.name: LinearScaleIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the current object is identical to the some predefined empty LinearScale object.

data.name: LinearScaleLabels
data.value: Provides access to the collection of text labels displayed on the same layer as the current scale.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelBarEmptyShape
data.value: Gets the shape used to paint the level bar's empty section.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelBarEndShape
data.value: Gets the shape used to paint the level bar's ending section.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelBarPackedShape
data.value: Gets the shape object used to paint the level bar's packed section.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelBarStartShape
data.value: Gets the shape of the level bar's starting section.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelLinearScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleLevel object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleLevel object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleLevelShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: LinearScaleMajorTickCount
data.value: Gets or sets the total number of major tickmarks displayed on a linear scale.

data.name: LinearScaleMajorTickmark
data.value: Provides access to major tick marks' display options.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerLinearScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleMarker object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerScale
data.value: Gets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleMarker object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerShape
data.value: Specifies the shape of the current object according to the current painting style specified by the ShapeType property.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerShapeOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the offset of the marker's center from the scale axis.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerShapeScale
data.value: A Factor2D structure that specifies the marker's scale factors along the X and Y axes.

data.name: LinearScaleMarkerShapeType
data.value: Gets or sets the object's painting style.

data.name: LinearScaleMaxValue
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum value of the linear scale.

data.name: LinearScaleMinorTickCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks on the scale between adjacent major tickmarks.

data.name: LinearScaleMinorTickmark
data.value: Provides access to minor tick marks' display options.

data.name: LinearScaleMinValue
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum value of the linear scale.

data.name: LinearScalePercent
data.value: Gets the percent of the current value, in relation to the scale's minimum and maximum values.

data.name: LinearScaleRangeBarLinearScale
data.value: Gets or sets the scale object to which the current LinearScaleRangeBar object is linked.

data.name: LinearScaleRanges
data.value: Provides access to the collection of custom ranges with which you can mark specific value ranges along the scale.

data.name: LinearScaleRescalingBestValues
data.value: Enables an algorithm for smart adjustment of the LinearScale.MinValue and LinearScale.MaxValue properties when the LinearScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: LinearScaleRescalingThresholdMax
data.value: Specifies the threshold, in percents, where the automatic correction of the LinearScale.MaxValue takes place. This property is in effect if the LinearScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: LinearScaleRescalingThresholdMin
data.value: Specifies the threshold, in percents, where the automatic correction of the LinearScale.MinValue takes place. This property is in effect if the LinearScale.AutoRescaling property is set to true.

data.name: LinearScaleStartPoint
data.value: Gets or sets the starting point of the scale.

data.name: LinearScaleValue
data.value: Gets or sets the scale's current value.

data.name: StateIndicatorCenter
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the state indicator's center within the parent gauge.

data.name: StateIndicatorSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the state indicator.

data.name: StateIndicatorState
data.value: Gets the state indicator's current state.

data.name: StateIndicatorStateIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the current state in the collection of states.

data.name: StateIndicatorStates
data.value: Contains states for the state indicator.
